channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Beyond Earth: How Space Is Transforming The Future Of Medicine
item.description: By removing the pull of gravity, space has accelerated breakthroughs once thought impossible, reshaping medicine, regenerating health and rewriting th...

item.title: AI Won’t Kill B2B SaaS—But It Will Upend How We Work And Spend
item.description: AI won't kill B2B SaaS—but it will transform how we work, spend and measure value, shifting power to those who master governance and visibility.

item.title: 9-Year-Old Boy Adopts Pit Bull Who Spent 95 Days In A Shelter
item.description: Cairo Hall dressed up to adopt his first dog, a pit bull mix named Waylon, at PAWS Shelter of Central Texas on June 1, 2025.

item.title: Edge, Sovereignty And Sustainability: The New Cloud Trilemma For Global Enterprises
item.description: The way a company manages speed alongside compliance and climate impact determines its strategic maturity and ethical leadership.

item.title: How Hackers Use A Smartwatch To Steal Highly Confidential Data
item.description: The newly revealed SmartAttack cyberattack can steal highly sensitive data from the most secure systems using a smartwatch. Here’s what you need to kn...

item.title: What do you need more of?
item.description: If our day (and our work) would get better if we had more: …we know where to get it. If not, then why are we spending our magical attention there?

item.title: Status (and the grass tax)
item.description: Status shows up whenever humans do, and it is the invisible underpinning of our culture. The front lawn was only invented around the time of Columbus....

item.title: Ecosystems come and go
item.description: Your project doesn’t exist in a vacuum. Your company wouldn’t exist if it weren’t for the customers, competitors, marketplaces, systems and tech that ...

item.title: Grab and go
item.description: Every retailer knows that the items that sell the best are at eye level or at the cash register. Some people are hungry, rushed, distracted and lazy. ...

item.title: Ready to be…
item.description: Disappointed Delighted Amazed Offended Ripped off Grateful Loved Sometimes we get what we expect.
